results.title: Tissue Plasminogen Activator-Induced Angioedema Involving a Posterior Cerebral Artery Infarct: A Case Presentation
results.text_hl: We describe an 84-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with a history of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ managed with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ who presented with an acute onset of right-sided @<m>DISEASE_Paresis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010291 @@@hemiparesis@@@, slurred speech, and right-sided @DISEASE_Hemianopsia @DISEASE_MESH:D006423 @@@hemianopsia@@@.

citations.NLM: Duymun S, Reddy V, Bentley E, Bose-Kolanu A. Tissue Plasminogen Activator-Induced Angioedema Involving a Posterior Cerebral Artery Infarct: A Case Presentation Am J Case Rep. 2021 Jan 14;22():e927137. PMID: 33441533
